ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
U.S. version tri-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/1800/1900 frequencies and GPRS capabilities
Affordable candybar phone with dedicated Walkman key, advanced digital audio player (MP3/AAC), and FM radio
Speakerphone for handsfree communication; Memory Stick Micro (M2) expansion up to 2 GB; VGA camera with video capture
Up to 7 hours of talk time, up to 300 hours (12.5 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson W200a Unlocked Phone with MP3/Video Player, and M2 Memory Slot--U.S. Version with No Warranty (Black)
